text: Andhera kono aparadha ne'i, khanjera kono aparadha ne'i ebam piritera'o kono aparadha ne'i ebam ye ke'u allaha o tamra rasulera anugatya karabe, tini take prabesa karabena emana jannate, yara nice naharasamuha prabahita; kintu ye byakti prsthapradarsana karabe tini take yantranadayaka sasti debena
